summary:
•	Customer service International expert, many years of experience in customer service, sales and purchases with successful and professional achievements. In the last years I have also developed expertise in dep. Finance with excelent results.
•	My strongest competencies are: Commercial, customer-oriented, perseverance, accurate, analysis & troubleshooter, negotiation techniques, multilingual,   multi-tasker en creative.
•	In my new role I seek a financial  or commercial job where I can use my skills and my skills and knowledge in a professional environment.

school.name: Technical University for Marketing& sales /HBO ISUM
Centrum Voor Volwassenenonderwijs, CVO in België

profile_positions.description:
- Contacting clients and international and national Real Estate agencies. (Belgium, Holland, England, Sweden, Norway, Finland (Area: Los arenales del Sol (elche), Busot and Benidorm).
-Selling and promoting our Happy homes services, cleaning, air maintenance, garden, rental services, sale of reforms, awnings, softener, windows, etc.
-Supervising quality control of the developments before delivery: Infinity View, Los Altos de Alicante, Arenales Playa 9 and 10, Sunset Waves.
- Delivering housing and giving a presentation in their corresponding language, explanation of the guarantees, attending to their requests, managing their requests, and offering services to guarantee their loyalty and satisfaction. Track customer satisfaction, calling them (proactive)
- Preparing documents for delivery, such as keys, guarantees, custody of keys. - Properly requesting from suppliers the equipment of the homes to be delivered.
- Supervising, auditing maintenance services, after-sales services and incidents.
- Registering claims in axapta until resolution and information to the client.
- Searching rentals homes from TM owners, requesting a tourism license, managing the holiday activity in my area Los arenales del sol and Benidorm: I take reservations, Collection, check-in, check-out, control of the status of the home (inventory), cleaning, keys, etc. informing the reservation center at all times.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service ) (multilingual: Dutch,English and Spanish)

company.name: EMZ parking & rental car in Spain Alicante

profile_positions.company: EMZ parking & rental car in Spain Alicante
profile_positions.description: •	Attending calls, receiving booking and emails, dealing the best price and service for international customers:  Holland, Belgium, Uk and Scandinavian countries, also Spanish Market and Algeria. Organizing the best planning so that the customer receives the key of the car at the time of arrival at the airport, being on time, the main goal. Personalized attention, making contracts for customer and processing payment by cash and credit card. Pickup and delivery of long parking cars.  Providing extra services for the customers such as:  applying ITV inspection, insurance and helping customers repairing small damage on theirs car, etc. Also Extra services, advising short and long rent holiday house for tourist. I have my Driver's license.
profile_positions.title: International Customer Service English Dutch and spanish

profile_positions.description:
Customer Service Representative At Vollrath Europe :

Being the first point of contact with customer in & outside Europe: Spain, Italy, Belgium, Holland, Germany, Norway, Finland, Switzerland, Czech Republic, Greece and Middle East) .
Working in a high performance environment, order management and having a very good organizational skills.
Advising and providing customers information about our products, pictures, manual instructions and certificate of our Vollrath products  - Entering Europeans orders and from USA in dollars as well.
I am responsible for arranging transport for inside Europe and exports sending. Collecting and making exports documents required for Middle East as Certificate of Origin and commercial invoice.   Account management, set up new account according our procedures, providing customer financial facilities and chasing for overdue payment invoices.
Providing customers quotes of our products of daily tasks. - communication skills in Spanish, English and Dutch . The ability to prioritize and being a multi-task person. Communication skills between internal Europeans countries, Mexico and contact with our financial department in USA.
profile_positions.title: Multilingual Customer Service Representative

company.name: International company Newell Rubbermaid (SSC) in Goirle

profile_positions.description:
•  Customer service, analyze and effectively investigating complaints, as wrong prices, supply shortages,organizing returns, request proof of delivery to the carrier, to find a good solution, identifying root cause and avoid it. Working with Spain / Italy and Portugal countries(EDI customers). Backup UK.
•  Making credit note or rejection of the credit note, but also re-invoicing according to procedures and regulations of SOX and GAAP.
•  The preparation of the matching proposal of credit notes and invoices.
•  Supporting financial department, with application of vendor invoices that have to do with rebates & agreements. Communication between collection specialist, sales, warehouse, finance. Gathering data between IT& customer EDI
•  Creating and checking in purchase orders, control and release for payment with suppliers (Dun & Bradstreet). Travelling to our offices in Madrid / Barcelona for migration purposes and projects.
profile_positions.title: Claims associate in (Accounts receivable):

profile_positions.description:
• Customer service, provide appropriate credit facilities. Providing financial information such as outstanding invoices and credit notes.
• Chase payments and sending reminders, controlling and assigning credit terms, assess and giving credit limit. Preparing matching proposal and write. Solve unapplied cash amounts.
• Making payment arrangement, minimizing the risk of credit, applying for credit report and review of credit limits for new customers. Setting up payment plans.
• Identifying and reporting doubtful account, so that provision is applied.  Quick decision on releasing orders. The approval and pay credit note to customers.
• Working with Spain / Italy and Portugal countries(EDI customers). Backup for the Benelux. Travelling to our offices in Madrid / Barcelona for migration purposes, sales meetings and projects.
profile_positions.title: Credit controller  in AR (Accounts receivable):
